com.licel.jcardsim.base

Interface SimulatorConfig


  • public interface SimulatorConfig
    Configuration options for SimulatorSystem
    See Also:
    JCSystem

      APDU Buffer size.
      static short API_VERSION
      Java Card API version.

      Maximum size of extended length APDUs.

      Support for extended-length APDUs.

      Interface protocol of software card emulation interface.

      Interface name of internal interface.

      static CardInterface.InterfaceConfig[] INTERFACES
      Interface configuration.
      static byte MAX_LOGICAL_CHANNELS
      Maximum number of logical channels.
      static boolean OBJECT_DELETION_SUPPORT
      Indicate object deletion support by not throwing an exception upon JCSystem.requestObjectDeletion().
